discourse_list.title: Using ProofOfHumanity and neuralink as nodes

content.content: So given PoH as it is, I thought about a maybe “crazy” idea, would be possible with the current technology or future to use every person as a node/validator, so instead of PoW, PoS, it’s PoH, like a neurolink tech… That a chip is inserted in every registered Human of the poh registry, and this chip validates transactions, this is a long term idea, and lots of research should be done imo, and idk also if it will be a good idea, any thoughts? Already asked to neuralink here: https://twitter.com/NachoBritos12/status/1428393406213107715?s=19 Using PoH as blockchain - Proof of Humanity - Proof of Humanity and UBI
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes using Proof of Humanity and Neuralink as nodes for a new type of blockchain, where every registered human would have a chip inserted to validate transactions. The author acknowledges that this is a long-term idea that requires further research and feedback. The author also mentions reaching out to Neuralink for their thoughts.
